item.title: Maduro arrives in US after stunning capture in operation that Trump says will let US 'run' Venezuela
item.description: Deposed Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro has arrived in the United States to face criminal charges

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 18-21-40-53-60, Powerball: 23

item.title: How cocaine and corruption led to the indictment of Maduro
item.description: A newly unsealed U.S. Justice Department indictment accuses captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro of running a “corrupt, illegitimate governmen...

item.title: Amid wildfire grief, an LA-area resident sowed sunflowers and hope where her home once stood
item.description: Missi Dowd-Figueroa has brought life back to her fire-ravaged plot in Altadena by planting sunflowers

item.title: Appeals panel says California's ban on open carry is unconstitutional
item.description: The ruling was issued by two judges on the 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals
